title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: There is a bug in Photon where the popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor.
OB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, the expected behavior is a popup menu to appear with options to add breakpoints/marks, etc. However, the menu does not appear.
EB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, the expected behavior is a popup menu to appear with options to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler
This should trigger the appearance of a popup menu with options to add breakpoints/marks, etc., however, the menu does not appear.
